name: Norman E. Fenton
content: Norman Fenton homepage NOTE: This page is no longer being updated.  Norman Fenton's new website is: https://www.normanfenton.com ​ ​Professor Emeritus of Risk at Queen Mary University of London (retired as Full Professor Dec 2022) and a Director of Agena, a company that specialises in artificial intelligence and Bayesian probabilistic reasoning. A mathematician by training with current focus on quantifying risk and uncertainty using causal, probabilistic models that combine data and knowledge (Bayesian networks). Published 7 books and over 400 peer reviewed articles. Works covers multiple domains including especially law and forensics (been an expert witness in major criminal and civil cases), and health. Active since 2020  analysing data related to Covid risk. ​Twitter: twitter.com/profnfenton Substack https://wherearethenumbers.substack.com/ YouTube: youtube.com/@NormanFenton81 Gettr: gettr.com/user/normanfenton Rumble: rumble.com/user/normanfenton Bitchute: bitchute.com/channel/zUwHexBX1ZJH/ Orcid: https://orcid.org/0000-0003-2924-0510 Odysee: odysee.com/@NormanFenton:b Google Scholar Researchgate Old Blog:  http://probabilityandlaw.blogspot.com/ Norman Fenton website last updated on 18 Dec, 2020 Please direct all comments about this website to n.fenton@qmul.ac.uk
